001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
004
005/**
006 * Implicit regularization comes from how the training is performed, not from an explicit penalty in the loss
007 *
008 * @param <N> Number type
009 */
010public interface ImplicitRegularization<N extends Number> extends Regularization<N> {
011
012    default N afterUpdateConstrain(N parameter) {
013        return parameter;
014    }
015
016    default DataSet<N> onBatch(DataSet<N> trainingSet) {
017        return trainingSet;
018    }
019
020    default N[] onActivations(int layer, N[] activations) {
021        return activations;
022    }
023
024    default DataSet<N> onTargets(DataSet<N> trainingSet) {
025        return trainingSet;
026    }
027
028    default boolean shouldStop(int epoch, N trainingLoss) {
029        return false;
030    }
031
032}
